meanings.definition: A device used for viewing movies.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new movieolas to watch the latest films.
meanings.sent2: The movieolas in the theater was big and had a clear screen.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought my movieolas was a magic box that showed moving pictures.
meanings.sent4: The movieolas transported me to a world of adventure and fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The movieolas made the characters on screen come to life before my eyes.

meanings.sent1: Movieolas is my favorite pastime on weekends.

meanings.sent3: My movieolas marathon ended with me dreaming of being a movie star.
meanings.sent4: Her movieolas was interrupted by a sudden power outage.
meanings.sent5: The joy of movieolas filled the room with laughter and excitement.

meanings.sent1: My movieolas includes classic films from different eras.
meanings.sent2: The movieolas at the film festival showcased a variety of genres.
meanings.sent3: His movieolas was so extensive that it filled an entire room.
